original_text: “Why wasn’t this perfume sold and the money given to the poor? It was worth a year’s wages.”
korean_text: 이 향유를 어찌하여 삼백 데나리온에 팔아 가난한 자들에게 주지 아니하였느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: and the money given to the poor?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 돈이 가난한 사람들에게 주어지지 않았는가?

sentences.original_text: It was worth a year's wages.
